title: It's Friday and Love and Work Continues - 04.07.17
itunes:title: It's Friday and Love and Work Continues - 04.07.17
description:
Eugene gets to do his blog today! The crew talks about the controversy behind the Pepsi commercial and some jobs Steve would do.
